doc:
Jackson Beck https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jackson_Beck 0 Jackson Beck (July 23, 1912 – July 28, 2004) was an American actor best known as the announcer on radio's The Adventures of Superman and the voice of Bluto in the Famous era Popeye theatrical shorts. Jackson_Beck ( July_23_,_1912 – July_28_,_2004 ) was an_American_actor best_known as the_announcer on radio 's_The_Adventures of Superman and the_voice of Bluto in the_Famous_era_Popeye_theatrical_shorts .
